message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.SI. 

This paper deals with reinforcement learning in latent-state environments, which is a common problem in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper proposes a general principle of advantage amplification to overcome the challenges of RL in such environments. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also deals with recommender systems, which fall under the sub-category cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper proposes aggregation methods, which can be related to cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
